Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D

Class SoundComponent

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.J2D.SoundComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class SoundComponent extends Object implements Constants
This class is a class of its own. It creates the Sound Component object.
It implements the Constants interface to use the constants.

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundComponent

      public SoundComponent() throws UnsupportedAudioFileException, LineUnavailableException, IOException
      Creates the Sound Component object.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - This exception is thrown to indicate an operation has failed because a file did not contain valid data.
      LineUnavailableException - This exception is thrown to indicate that a line cannot be opened because it is unavailable.
      IOException - This exception is thrown to indicate some sort of error had occurred using InputStreams. (Very common).
